title: Toisy by Letrizmo: the REAL disco thing!
content:
Letrizmo Digitipia releases Toisy. In the last days of the seventies, when contempt was the only feeling for everything that smelled disco, there was a strange sense of pride. Toisy, Toisy Alt and Toisy Greek capture the very essence of the glamorous life circa 1981.

Check it out! and set it real tight...

One of the three debut fonts from Letrizmo, the new mexican foundry of Victor Yb Delgado
